metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28896 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mutt before 2.0.2 and NeoMutt before 2020-11-20 did not ensure that$ssl_force_tls was processed if an IMAP server's initial server responsewas invalid. The connection was not properly closed, and the code couldcontinue attempting to authenticate. This could result in authenticationcredentials being exposed on an unencrypted connection, or to amachine-in-the-middle.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.13.2-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.2-1ubuntu0.3').
neomutt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
